column5: BRS sold the rest of my shares Made some nice money here HK is my last bankrupt crapper left Hoping for a nice run tomorrow

HK Halcon Resources is burning cash has large debt limited current assets no CEO and an immediate need to raise cashThe company has to resolve at least part of its debt situation by the end of Q2 2019 to avoid violating its Senior Credit AgreementIt is hard to see any scenario in which the stock turns into an attractive potential investment

HK so the acreage is mostly marginal the debt is unsustainable and growing the production is not wanted the margins are low and even if the acreage were better theres not enough of it This did not end well
HK come on you sack of garbage RVLT EMES BRS all had their day in the sun recently HK is long overdue
